if you like being frustrated or pouring 1000 hours into a game before having fun, this is for you.

The longer you play this game, the more it siphons away your soul. Any redeemable qualities you once had are drained, leaving you as a barely living husk of toxicity.

Overall 8.5 out of 10

The best competitive shooter on the market hands down. There is a reason why the player-base is one of the highest on Steam 8 years after its launch, and it is because of the massive amount of time and effort that the game requires, and the reward of unforgettable games with your friends or meeting new people who you will play with for years to come. If you are willing to put in the time, CS:GO will easily become your favorite FPS and change the way you look at multiplayer.

this is quite a small game with a nice, small and clean community. The skin market has really balanced prices and anyone can build a nice inventory. I've never seen a hacker, even after f2p. I especially love how nice the community is as well as the fair ranking system. I have never had to deal with toxic teammates. all in all 10/10 would not play any other game,
